title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes the Packers win over the 49ers showed they are a different team than they were in the past. He thinks Matthew Stafford is elevating the Rams to new heights after an impressive win over Tom Brady and the Buccaneers. He tells you why he was right about Ben Roethlisberger and wrong about the Raiders. Plus, Chargers head coach Brandon Staley joins the show to discuss their win over the Chiefs and his decision to go for game winning touchdown instead of settling for a field goal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
